# backgroundColor

**Instance Property**

The background color of the action button.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var backgroundColor: UIColor! { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is determined by the value of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContextualAction/style-swift.property] property, which determines the default appearance of the button. Assigning a new color to this property changes the background to the color that you specify.

## Configuring the appearance

- **title**: The title displayed on the action button.
- **image**: The image to display in the action button.
